article_title: Death toll in Beirut explosion rises to six - Lebanese state media.
sentence: As  we've  been  reporting,  among  the  dead  is  the  deputy  head  of  Hamas's  political  bureau  Saleh  al-Arouri.

article_title: Death toll in Beirut explosion rises to six - Lebanese state media.
sentence: It  was  reported  earlier  that  four  people  had  been  killed.
